var mongoose = require('mongoose');
 
var imageSchema = new mongoose.Schema({
    nome: String,
    tipo: String,
    aprovacao: String,
    mat_ins: String,
    material: String,
    depto: String,
    nome_depto: String,
    valor: String,
    data: String,
    obs: String,
    nun_lote: String,
    conta: String,
    vda: String,
    nun_parcela: String,
    tipo_cartao: String,
    flag: String,
    user: String,
    img:
    {
        name: String,
        data: Buffer,
        contentType: String
    }
});
 
//Image is a model which has a schema imageSchema
 
module.exports = new mongoose.model('Image', imageSchema);

<script>
    const demo2 = new autoComplete({
    selector: '#material',
    minChars: 1,
    source: function (term, suggest) {
      term = term.toLowerCase();
      var choices = [
      'Kit do Sabado',
      'Tia Helenita',
      'Aventurismo'
      ];

      var suggestions = [];
      for (i = 0; i < choices.length; i++)
        if (~choices[i].toLowerCase().indexOf(term)) suggestions.push(choices[i]);
      suggest(suggestions);
    }
  });
    </script>
